name: Mentos Geyser
description:
A Coke and Mentos eruption is always fun to see.
Wanna create some?

Hold and drag your finger to align where should the “Mentos” ball bounce. Lift your finger up to toss the ball into the Cola bottle.

Take advantage of the objects to create a perfect bouncing route and goal.

Can’t clear the stage? No worries! Collect as many hints as you can to use them later on. The hint will show you where should you drop the Mentos ball.

Also, the more coins you get and the more stages you clear, the more Skins (Ball, Bottle, Background) will be unlocked.

One more exciting thing is that, once you collect all 3 keys, you will have a chance to receive a prize which is a new ball hidden behind one of the boxes.

Now, join this experiment and erupt all the coca bottles
